CustomField.description: When checked, apex will queue up a batch process to refresh all of the tax groups from Timberline. This value should be updated via a button somewhere in the UI
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, a request will be queued up to refresh ALL Tax Group data (not just for this record). You will only need to check this box once to refresh all Tax Groups.
CustomField.label: Refresh Tax Groups
